item.title:
The Boirault machine was an early French experimental landship, designed in 1914 and built in early 1915. It has been considered as an interesting ancestor of the tank.
This colorized video shows its test in 1915
[read more: https://t.co/lEoj79DHob] https://t.co/73zVCe9Cki
